meanings.definition: A person or group that makes something again or differently.
meanings.sent1: The remakers created a new version of the classic movie.
meanings.sent2: The remakers of the painting added their own unique touch to it.
meanings.sent3: The remakers decided to make a comedy out of the serious play.
meanings.sent4: The remakers transformed the old building into a modern art gallery.
meanings.sent5: The remakers brought fresh ideas to the project, making it stand out.

meanings.sent1: We hired remakers to update our website design.
meanings.sent2: The remakers improved the recipe by using healthier ingredients.
meanings.sent3: The remakers turned the boring event into a fun-filled party.
meanings.sent4: The remakers reshaped the garden into a beautiful oasis.
meanings.sent5: The remakers worked tirelessly to enhance the product's features.
